items.sentence: When are you going to talk to Tom about that?
Admission is free, but donations are welcome.
All Tom does all day long is play the guitar.
All four of my grandparents are still living.
Tom really didn\'t want to work this morning.
Tom had no qualms about cheating on the test.
Tom handed his keys to the parking attendant.
Tom happened to meet Mary at the supermarket.
Tom has a huge collection of stuffed animals.
Tom and Mary aren\'t actually our real names.
Tom and Mary aren\'t really dating, are they?
I don\'t think that Tom can play the trumpet.
I don\'t think that anybody has told Tom yet.
Can you guess what type of restaurant it was?
Can you tell me how to get to Lincoln Center?
You aren\'t going dressed like that, are you?
I\'m going to talk to Tom when he comes home.
I\'m happy to sit out here and chat with you.
I\'m interested in creating my own web pages.
I\'m likely going to be fired for doing that.
I don\'t want to be the one to tell Tom that.
I don\'t want to burden you with my problems.
Tom took off his glasses and rubbed his eyes.
Are you going to be eating that piece of pie?
Are you sure you want to do that by yourself?
Tom told me that he\'d wait until I returned.
I\'m the one who recommended Tom for the job.
I\'m the only one here that can speak French.
I\'ve already explained it to Tom many times.
Did you expect something different to happen?
Do you remember the first time you kissed me?
Do you remember where you left your umbrella?
Do you sell any guidebooks written in French?
Tom is obviously upset with Mary\'s behavior.
I still have the watch you gave me years ago.
I suggest you do your job and let me do mine.
I suggest you let Tom do what he wants to do.
Tom and Mary said they probably will do that.
Tom and Mary seldom give each other presents.

Well, aren\'t you going to answer your phone?

When was the last time you hung out with Tom?
When was the last time you painted a picture?
If Tom had had time, he would\'ve visited us.
You shouldn\'t judge a man by his appearance.
It\'s a rainy day, so we can\'t play outside.
It\'s amazing that we all didn\'t get killed.
You need to be more positive about your work.
Tom plans to hire someone that speaks French.
